name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: A central sector scheme providing financial support to farmers.
eligibility: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land.
benefits: ₹6,000 annual income support in three equal installments
Direct transfer to farmers' bank accounts

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund
description: A scheme providing medium to long-term debt financing for agricultural infrastructure.
eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, PACS, marketing cooperatives, startups, and central/state agencies.
benefits: Financial support for post-harvest management and community farming assets
Interest subvention and credit guarantee support

name: Agricultural Technology Management Agency
description: A scheme for strengthening agricultural extension services through decentralized, participatory approaches.
eligibility: All farmers across India.
benefits: Capacity building of farmers through training and demonstrations
Support for farmer groups and cooperatives

name: AGMARKNET
description: A scheme to link agricultural markets and disseminate real-time market information.
eligibility: Farmers, traders, and market stakeholders.
benefits: Provides daily market prices and arrivals
Helps farmers get better prices for their produce

name: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture
description: A scheme promoting holistic growth of the horticulture sector.
eligibility: Horticulture farmers and stakeholders.
benefits: Support for post-harvest management and value addition

name: Online Pesticide Registration
description: A system for online registration of pesticides to ensure safety and compliance.
eligibility: Pesticide manufacturers and traders.

name: Plant Quarantine Clearance
description: A regulatory mechanism to prevent the introduction of exotic pests and diseases.
eligibility: Importers and exporters of agricultural commodities.
benefits: Prevents the spread of plant diseases
Regulates import and export of plants

name: Direct Benefit Transfer in Agriculture
description: A Direct Benefit Transfer system to ensure financial benefits reach farmers directly.
eligibility: Eligible farmers for government subsidy schemes.
benefits: Ensures timely and transparent fund transfer

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana
description: A scheme to improve irrigation efficiency and ensure water security for farming.
eligibility: All farmers, including small and marginal farmers.

name: Kisan Call Center
description: A toll-free helpline providing real-time agricultural information and support.
eligibility: All farmers across India.

name: e-NAM
description: An online trading platform for agricultural commodities to create a unified market.
eligibility: Farmers, traders, and market stakeholders.
benefits: Online trading for better access to markets

name: Kisan Credit Card Scheme
description: A credit scheme to provide short-term loans to farmers for agricultural and related expenses.
eligibility: All farmers engaged in agricultural activities.
benefits: Easy access to short-term credit for agriculture

name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture
description: A scheme to promote sustainable agricultural practices in response to climate change.
eligibility: All farmers practicing agriculture.
benefits: Provides financial aid for sustainable farming

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: A scheme promoting organic farming through cluster-based approaches.
eligibility: Organic farmers and farmer groups.
benefits: Financial support for organic farming clusters

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: A crop insurance scheme providing financial support against crop failure.
eligibility: All farmers, including sharecroppers and tenant farmers growing notified crops in the notified areas.
benefits: Comprehensive risk coverage for pre-sowing to post-harvest losses
Use of technology for quick claim settlement

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: A scheme to promote balanced use of fertilizers for better soil health.
eligibility: All farmers across India.
benefits: Provides soil health reports to farmers
Recommends nutrients for better crop yield

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: A scheme to ensure holistic development of agriculture and allied sectors.
eligibility: State governments, UTs, and farmers engaged in agriculture.
benefits: Financial assistance for innovative farming practices
Support for research and development in agriculture

name: National Food Security Mission
description: A mission to increase production of rice, wheat, pulses, and coarse cereals.
eligibility: Farmers growing targeted crops in identified districts.
benefits: Financial assistance for high-yield seed varieties

name: Dairy Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
description: A scheme to promote self-employment in the dairy sector.
eligibility: Individual farmers, SHGs, NGOs, and dairy cooperatives.
benefits: Encourages production and processing of milk
Support for cold storage and marketing

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maan Dhan Yojana
description: A pension scheme for small and marginal farmers to ensure financial security post-retirement.
eligibility: Farmers aged 18-40 years with landholding up to 2 hectares.
benefits: Provides a monthly pension of ₹3,000 after 60 years
Government contribution equal to farmer’s contribution
Ensures financial security for aging farmers
